text: George Stephen LeMieux (; born May 21, 1969) is an American politician. He was a United States Senator from Florida from 2009 to 2011. He is chairman of the Florida-based law firm of Gunster Yoakley & Stewart and was chief of staff to Governor Charlie Crist. He was the Deputy Florida Attorney General. On August 28, 2009, Crist announced he would appoint LeMieux as U.S. Senator to replace Mel Mart√≠nez, who weeks earlier had announced he would resign as soon as Crist announced his replacement. On April 5, 2011, LeMieux announced that he would run against incumbent Democratic Senator Bill Nelson in 2012, but dropped out of the race in June 2012. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from Florida Category:Lawyers from Florida Category:Businesspeople from Florida Category:Politicians from Fort Lauderdale, Florida Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Emory University alumni
title: George LeMieux
